resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157245</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157245</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3229</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Call for Reading Kit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Aufruf für Leseinstallationssatz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'appel pour le kit de lecture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O atendimento para o jogo da leitura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La richiesta per il kit della lettura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κλήση για την εξάρτηση ανάγνωσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La llamada para el kit de la lectura</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">THis is a set of computer assisted Language Learning Materials designed for Junior High School students who have yet to master basic reading skills in English as a Foreign Language.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Set Computer unterstützte 
Erlernen- der Sprachematerialien, die für Juniorhigh School 
Kursteilnehmer konzipiert sind, die, grundlegende Lesefähigkeiten auf
englisch als Fremdsprache schon zu erarbeiten haben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ceci est un ensemble de matériaux aidés par 
ordinateur de connaissance des langues conçus pour les étudiants de 
lycée junior qui ont maîtriser encore des qualifications de base de 
lecture en anglais comme langue étrangère.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é um jogo dos materiais ajudados computador 
da aprendizagem de língua projetados para os estudantes da High 
School júnior que têm para dominar ainda habilidades básicas da 
leitura em inglês como uma língua extrangeira.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un insieme dei materiali aiutati 
calcolatore di apprendimento delle lingue progettati per gli allievi 
della 'junior high school'che hanno ancora acquistare padronanza delle
abilità di base della lettura in inglese come lingua straniera.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το THis είναι ένα σύνολο με υπολογιστή υλικών 
εκμάθησης γλωσσών που σχεδιάζονται για τους κατώτερους σπουδαστές
γυμνασίου που πρέπει να κατέχουν ακόμα τις βασικές δεξιότητες 
ανάγνωσης στα αγγλικά ως ξένη γλώσσα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es un conjunto de materiales asistidos 
ordenador del aprendizaje de idiomas diseñados para los estudiantes 
de la High School secundaria menor que tienen todavía dominar 
habilidades básicas de la lectura en inglés como idioma extranjero.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesefähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">qualifications de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">habilidades da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abilità della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δεξιότητες ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">habilidades de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
